Emotional_Intelligence_&_Depth.title: Emotional Depth & Awareness
Emotional_Intelligence_&_Depth.description: I respect people who think deeply about life, about themselves, and about their impact on others. If your personality is based on surface-level experiences and distractions, I will not find you interesting.

Emotional_Intelligence_&_Depth.title: Emotional Availability
Emotional_Intelligence_&_Depth.description: I engage in relationships with people who are open, expressive, and willing to share their emotions. If you are emotionally distant or shut down, we are not aligned.

Emotional_Intelligence_&_Depth.title: Self-Awareness & Reflection
Emotional_Intelligence_&_Depth.description: I constantly analyze my actions and strive for growth. If you lack self-awareness or refuse to reflect on your behavior, we will not connect.

Emotional_Intelligence_&_Depth.title: I Do Not Suppress My Emotions
Emotional_Intelligence_&_Depth.description: I feel deeply and allow myself to express it. If you expect me to be emotionally detached or 'chill' all the time, I am not for you.

Emotional_Intelligence_&_Depth.title: I Am Not Afraid of Vulnerability
Emotional_Intelligence_&_Depth.description: I see vulnerability as strength, not weakness. If you struggle with emotional openness, our connection will be unsatisfying.

Emotional_Intelligence_&_Depth.title: I Need People Who Can Handle Intensity
Emotional_Intelligence_&_Depth.description: I experience emotions intensely and expect those around me to navigate that depth. If you shy away from deep emotional experiences, we won’t work.

Emotional_Intelligence_&_Depth.title: I Overthink Everything
Emotional_Intelligence_&_Depth.description: I analyze situations deeply. If you prefer to live on autopilot and avoid self-reflection, we will likely clash.

Emotional_Intelligence_&_Depth.title: I Can Be Overly Critical of Myself
Emotional_Intelligence_&_Depth.description: I hold myself to very high standards—even to a fault. If you lack patience or compassion, our perspectives will differ.

Emotional_Intelligence_&_Depth.title: I Pick Up on Small Details
Emotional_Intelligence_&_Depth.description: I notice inconsistencies, subtle changes, and hidden meanings. If you are someone who hides or distorts the truth, I will figure it out.

Emotional_Intelligence_&_Depth.title: I Do Not Entertain Surface-Level Relationships
Emotional_Intelligence_&_Depth.description: I require depth, thoughtfulness, and intentionality. If you are emotionally shallow or avoid difficult conversations, we will not work.

Communication_&_Honesty.title: Radical Honesty & Transparency
Communication_&_Honesty.description: I don’t play games. I say what I mean, and I mean what I say. If you are secretive, misleading, or avoid difficult conversations, we will not work.

Communication_&_Honesty.title: Direct Communication
Communication_&_Honesty.description: I do not do passive-aggressiveness, hinting, or subtle messaging. If you have something to say, say it. If you expect me to decode your feelings, keep moving.

Communication_&_Honesty.title: I Will Not Chase You
Communication_&_Honesty.description: If you expect me to text or call first every time, this will not work. Communication is a two-way street—I expect mutual effort.

Communication_&_Honesty.title: I Need Clarity & Consistency
Communication_&_Honesty.description: I do not deal with mixed signals. If you are hot and cold or your words don’t match your actions, I will walk away.

Communication_&_Honesty.title: I Expect People to Mean What They Say
Communication_&_Honesty.description: I take words seriously. If you make empty promises or say things you don’t mean, I will not trust you.

Communication_&_Honesty.title: I Do Not Tolerate Lying
Communication_&_Honesty.description: Even small lies break trust. If you have a habit of dishonesty, we will not work.

Communication_&_Honesty.title: I Need Reassurance & Affirmation
Communication_&_Honesty.description: I like knowing where I stand. If you struggle to express feelings or offer reassurance, I may feel disconnected.

Communication_&_Honesty.title: I Can Be Blunt & Unfiltered
Communication_&_Honesty.description: I say what I think and do not sugarcoat things. If you are easily offended by direct honesty, we may not be compatible.

Communication_&_Honesty.title: I Do Not Like Unnecessary Small Talk
Communication_&_Honesty.description: I prefer meaningful conversations. If you only engage in surface-level chatter, I will likely lose interest.

Communication_&_Honesty.title: I Expect Mutual Effort in Conversations
Communication_&_Honesty.description: I do not carry conversations alone. If you give one-word answers or fail to engage, I will stop trying.

Communication_&_Honesty.title: Matching Energy Matters
Communication_&_Honesty.description: If I’m putting in effort and you’re giving me the bare minimum, you will lose access to me.

Communication_&_Honesty.title: Quality Over Quantity in Communication
Communication_&_Honesty.description: I don’t need constant texting, but I do need quality. If you text just to check a box without engaging, I will lose interest.

Communication_&_Honesty.title: I Respond Based on Energy
Communication_&_Honesty.description: If you’re inconsistent, so am I. If you’re all in, so am I. If you disappear, so do I. I reflect the effort I receive.

Communication_&_Honesty.title: Active Engagement in Conversations
Communication_&_Honesty.description: If I’m giving you my time, I expect you to engage actively. One-word replies and lackluster responses will not suffice.

Communication_&_Honesty.title: Expressing Emotions Clearly
Communication_&_Honesty.description: I believe emotions should be communicated openly. If you shut down or expect me to guess how you feel, this will not work.

Commitment_&_Stability.title: Consistency & Follow-Through
Commitment_&_Stability.description: I believe words should match actions. If you say one thing and do another, I will not take you seriously. Inconsistency, unreliability, or emotional hot-and-cold behavior is unacceptable.

Commitment_&_Stability.title: Loyalty & Dedication
Commitment_&_Stability.description: If I care about you, I show up. I am not interested in flakiness or people who treat relationships as optional. If commitment scares you, we are not a match.

Commitment_&_Stability.title: I Struggle with Commitment
Commitment_&_Stability.description: I sometimes find it hard to commit fully—whether due to past experiences or a need for independence. If you require unwavering commitment from the start, I may not be for you.

Commitment_&_Stability.title: I Take Commitment Seriously
Commitment_&_Stability.description: I do not enter relationships lightly. When I commit, I follow through and expect the same dedication.

Commitment_&_Stability.title: I Get Anxious About Uncertainty
Commitment_&_Stability.description: If you leave things open-ended or undefined, I will overthink and struggle with the lack of clarity.

Commitment_&_Stability.title: I Need Stability & Security
Commitment_&_Stability.description: I thrive in stable environments. If you are unpredictable or unreliable, I will not feel safe with you.

Commitment_&_Stability.title: I Do Not Settle for Half-Hearted Effort
Commitment_&_Stability.description: If you want to be in my life, be in it fully. I do not entertain minimal or intermittent effort.

Commitment_&_Stability.title: I Have High Standards
Commitment_&_Stability.description: I know what I want and do not settle. If my standards intimidate you, we are not a match.

Boundaries_&_Independence.title: I Do Not Negotiate My Boundaries
Boundaries_&_Independence.description: If I set a boundary, it is final. If you push, test, or try to change it, I will remove you.

Boundaries_&_Independence.title: I Need Personal Space
Boundaries_&_Independence.description: I am not someone who thrives on constant interaction. Overly clingy, dependent behavior or needing 24/7 attention will suffocate me.

Boundaries_&_Independence.title: I Don’t Explain My 'No'
Boundaries_&_Independence.description: No is a full sentence. I won't justify my limits beyond that. If you need constant justification, we will not align.

Boundaries_&_Independence.title: I Will Walk Away If You Cross the Line
Boundaries_&_Independence.description: I do not believe in endless second chances. Cross my boundaries once and I'll address it; do it again, and I will cut ties.

Boundaries_&_Independence.title: I Don’t Do Obligation Friendships/Relationships
Boundaries_&_Independence.description: History does not entitle you to my time or energy. If our connection stops serving me, I'll let it go.

Boundaries_&_Independence.title: I Can Be Emotionally Distant
Boundaries_&_Independence.description: If I feel overwhelmed, I may shut down. I need people who can handle that without assuming the worst. Constant need for emotional availability won't work.

Boundaries_&_Independence.title: I Do Not Over-Extend Myself
Boundaries_&_Independence.description: If I don’t want to do something, I won’t. Guilt-tripping or pressuring me will not change my decision.

Boundaries_&_Independence.title: I Struggle with Emotional Vulnerability
Boundaries_&_Independence.description: I do not easily let people in. If you need constant verbal reassurance or immediate emotional openness, I might not be the right match.

Boundaries_&_Independence.title: I Will Not Be Controlled
Boundaries_&_Independence.description: If you are possessive, jealous, or try to dictate my life, I will walk away without hesitation.

Boundaries_&_Independence.title: I Need My Own Life Outside of Relationships
Boundaries_&_Independence.description: I will not sacrifice my friends, hobbies, or independence. If you need someone to be your entire world, I'm not that person.

Boundaries_&_Independence.title: I Don’t Like Being Told What to Do
Boundaries_&_Independence.description: If you constantly try to correct or lecture me, we will clash. I respect advice, but not control.

Boundaries_&_Independence.title: I Can Be Stubborn in My Decisions
Boundaries_&_Independence.description: Once I make up my mind, it’s hard to change it. If you expect me to constantly reconsider for your sake, we won’t get along.

Boundaries_&_Independence.title: I Do Not Chase People Who Pull Away
Boundaries_&_Independence.description: If you distance yourself, I see it as a sign to move on. I don't run after those who don't prioritize me.

Boundaries_&_Independence.title: I Prioritize Myself First
Boundaries_&_Independence.description: I will not sacrifice my needs for someone else’s. If you expect me to bend over backward, I'm not that person.

Boundaries_&_Independence.title: I Expect Respect for My Time
Boundaries_&_Independence.description: If you constantly cancel, are late, or don’t respect my schedule, I will stop making time for you.

Boundaries_&_Independence.title: I Value Deep Emotional Connection
Boundaries_&_Independence.description: I believe in close, engaged relationships. If you prefer to remain emotionally detached, we won't work.

Boundaries_&_Independence.title: I Need Reassurance & Emotional Availability
Boundaries_&_Independence.description: I appreciate regular check-ins and clear expressions of care. If you struggle with this, we may not align.

Boundaries_&_Independence.title: I Like Spending a Lot of Time Together
Boundaries_&_Independence.description: I enjoy sharing quality time and experiences. Extreme independence might not suit my needs.

Boundaries_&_Independence.title: I Thrive in Close Relationships
Boundaries_&_Independence.description: I require strong emotional intimacy and continuous engagement. Overly casual or distant behavior won't suffice.

Boundaries_&_Independence.title: I Appreciate When Someone Takes the Lead
Boundaries_&_Independence.description: I value partners who are decisive and guide our interactions. If you expect me to always lead, we may not match.

Boundaries_&_Independence.title: I Can Be Needy Sometimes
Boundaries_&_Independence.description: I value reassurance and connection and may sometimes require extra attention. If you need total detachment, we won’t align.

Boundaries_&_Independence.title: I Struggle with Being Alone for Too Long
Boundaries_&_Independence.description: I enjoy personal space, but I also need consistent presence and effort from those I care about.

Boundaries_&_Independence.title: I Want a Partner Who Shows Up for Me
Boundaries_&_Independence.description: If you struggle with commitment, effort, or consistency, you will hurt me. I need to feel chosen, not like an afterthought.

Values_&_Lifestyle.title: I Prioritize Growth & Self-Improvement
Values_&_Lifestyle.description: I constantly seek to evolve mentally, emotionally, and spiritually. If you are comfortable staying the same, we may not align.

Values_&_Lifestyle.title: I Value Intelligence & Thoughtfulness
Values_&_Lifestyle.description: I enjoy deep conversations, curiosity, and intellectual exploration. If you do not actively engage in learning or critical thinking, I may lose interest.

Values_&_Lifestyle.title: I Do Not Tolerate Ignorance
Values_&_Lifestyle.description: If you refuse to educate yourself on important topics or dismiss others’ perspectives without thought, we will not get along.

Values_&_Lifestyle.title: I Believe in Personal Responsibility
Values_&_Lifestyle.description: I do not believe in blaming others for my problems. If you constantly play the victim or avoid accountability, we are not compatible.

Values_&_Lifestyle.title: I Believe in Hard Work & Ambition
Values_&_Lifestyle.description: I set goals and work toward them. If you lack motivation or expect things to be handed to you, we will clash.

Values_&_Lifestyle.title: I Am Financially Conscious
Values_&_Lifestyle.description: I manage my money intentionally—whether saving, investing, or spending wisely. Reckless financial habits are a deal-breaker.

Values_&_Lifestyle.title: I Live a Healthy Lifestyle
Values_&_Lifestyle.description: I prioritize my physical and mental well-being. If you disregard your health, we will not align.

Values_&_Lifestyle.title: I Do Not Drink/Smoke/Do Drugs
Values_&_Lifestyle.description: I have no interest in substances. If partying or casual substance use defines your lifestyle, we may not match.

Values_&_Lifestyle.title: I Enjoy Going Out & Socializing
Values_&_Lifestyle.description: I love social events, meeting new people, and experiencing life. If you prefer staying home all the time, we may struggle.

Values_&_Lifestyle.title: I Prefer a Low-Key Lifestyle
Values_&_Lifestyle.description: I enjoy quiet environments, deep connections, and small gatherings. If you constantly seek external stimulation, we may not align.

Values_&_Lifestyle.title: I Need a Balance of Adventure & Stability
Values_&_Lifestyle.description: I thrive with both spontaneity and routine. If you are too rigid or too chaotic, we may not work.

Values_&_Lifestyle.title: I Believe in Monogamy & Loyalty
Values_&_Lifestyle.description: I do not entertain situationships or non-exclusive relationships. If you are not fully invested, we will not align.

Values_&_Lifestyle.title: I Am Open to Non-Traditional Relationships
Values_&_Lifestyle.description: I’m flexible about relationship norms. If you require strict traditionality, we may not be compatible.

Values_&_Lifestyle.title: I Have Strong Cultural/Religious Ties
Values_&_Lifestyle.description: My culture or faith plays a significant role in my life. If you cannot respect that, we are not compatible.

Values_&_Lifestyle.title: I Prefer a Secular/Non-Religious Lifestyle
Values_&_Lifestyle.description: Religion is not a major factor in my life, and I prefer partners who share that perspective.

Values_&_Lifestyle.title: I Am Politically Engaged
Values_&_Lifestyle.description: I care deeply about social and political issues. If you are indifferent to the world around you, we may not align.

Values_&_Lifestyle.title: I Do Not Engage in Political Debates
Values_&_Lifestyle.description: I’m not interested in constant political arguments. If discussing politics is your main focus, we may not match.

Values_&_Lifestyle.title: I Am an Animal Lover
Values_&_Lifestyle.description: Pets are a huge part of my life, and I value kindness towards animals. If you dislike or mistreat them, we will not get along.

Values_&_Lifestyle.title: I Am Child-Free & Plan to Stay That Way
Values_&_Lifestyle.description: I do not want children and have no plans to change that. If you want kids, we are not compatible.

Values_&_Lifestyle.title: I Want a Family in the Future
Values_&_Lifestyle.description: I see children and family as important goals. If you do not want kids, we will not work long-term.

Values_&_Lifestyle.title: I Value Alone Time
Values_&_Lifestyle.description: I enjoy solitude and need regular time to recharge. If you expect constant engagement, I will feel drained.

Values_&_Lifestyle.title: I Love Traveling & New Experiences
Values_&_Lifestyle.description: I prioritize exploring the world and embracing adventure. If you prefer routine and familiarity, we may not align.

Values_&_Lifestyle.title: I Am Career-Driven
Values_&_Lifestyle.description: My work and ambitions are a major part of my life. If you expect me to always be available over my goals, we may not be compatible.

Values_&_Lifestyle.title: I Am Family-Oriented
Values_&_Lifestyle.description: I have strong ties to my family and value close relationships. If you are distant from your family, we may not align.

Values_&_Lifestyle.title: I Am Not Emotionally Attached to Family
Values_&_Lifestyle.description: My family does not define my life, and I maintain some distance. If family is your top priority, we may not see eye to eye.

Values_&_Lifestyle.title: I Am a Minimalist
Values_&_Lifestyle.description: I prefer a simple, intentional lifestyle over excessive materialism. If you value luxury and consumerism, we may not align.

Values_&_Lifestyle.title: I Appreciate the Finer Things
Values_&_Lifestyle.description: I enjoy luxury, high-end experiences, and material comforts. If you do not value this, we may not share the same outlook.

Values_&_Lifestyle.title: I Live an Unconventional Lifestyle
Values_&_Lifestyle.description: I do not follow the typical societal path. If you need someone who fits into a traditional mold, we may not be a match.
